[AbeloHost](https://www.abelohost.com) is a high quality hosting provider. By hosting on our servers you will benefit from increased performance, greater security, immediate support and exclusive use of the servers system and network resources. Our pledge is to provide our customers with nothing but the best-quality and the most fully-featured services at reasonable prices. 

•••••••••• **Benefits of choosing AbeloHost** ••••••••••

- DDoS protection ([click here for a picture of our actual DDoS filter that we use](http://i.imgur.com/MWNp3Fw.jpg)) 
- Full data integrity 
- Located in a TIER III datacenter
- Friendly and knowledgeable technical staff and excellent customer service 


•••••••••• **ATOM SATA**••••••••••

- Intel® Atom® D525 DualCore 1.8 GHz
- 2GB DDR3 ECC
- 2 x 1TB SATA (options for more possible) 
- Unmetered traffic 
- 100mbps guaranted (options for more) on 1Gbps shared port
- Root Access
- IPMI Access
- 1 IP Address

*39 EUR (42.60 US Dollar)* | No long term contracts
